item.description:
http://www.coolidge.org/node/2270DANGER ZONE: The 80's Movie Anthem Sing-a-long
80s Movie Anthem Sing Along from Resident Clinton on Vimeo.Coolidge Corner Theatre March 7-March 8, 2009 $10 per seat. Add Review/Comment While not every movie we grew up loving in the 80s holds up as a masterpiece, there is no better decade for truly anthemic theme songs: Footloose, Ghostbusters, View To A Kill, Maniac, I Can Dream About You, Don't You Forget About Me, The Power of Love, The Heat Is On, When Doves Cry, She's Like the Wind...the list goes on and on. For this special night we honor the iconic music as well as the classic movies -- by singing along! $10 All Seats
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in their big huge lobby with Cotton Candy
item.name: DANGER ZONE: The 80s Movie Anthem Sing-Along
